trans-unit.source: Base type for <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref> and any custom conditions created by users.
trans-unit.target: Tipo di base per <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref> e qualsiasi condizione personalizzata creata dagli utenti.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, crea una copia completa dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> that is identical to this instance
When overridden in a derived class, evaluates the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The runtime context the rule is running in.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto di runtime, la regola viene eseguita.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> evaluated to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per verificare che il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> restituito <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the dependencies for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, ottiene le dipendenze per il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> that was used previously in a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> precedentemente utilizzata in una chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>

trans-unit.source: A list of symbols that represent entities read by the condition.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco di simboli che rappresentano le entità lette dalla condizione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when all properties have been given values.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando tutte le proprietà sono state assegnate valori.

trans-unit.source: After this call, no properties can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Dopo questa chiamata, è non possibile modificare alcuna proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, verifica che il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> sia configurato correttamente e non presenti errori.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>contiene errori (il `Validate` restituisce `false`), quindi <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>conterrà l'elenco di errori rilevati.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> that is used to manage the validation of rules and rule conditions.
trans-unit.target: L'istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> utilizzato per gestire la convalida delle regole e condizioni della regola.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> has no errors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per verificare che il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> non presenta errori; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
